Key Match Events: Fakhar hits superb 81 off 74 balls, Shafique adds 68
Pakistan chase 205 to win by seven wickets
Bangladesh becomes the first team to be eliminated
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan captain Babar Azam emphasized the team's focus on improving their net run-rate
Steven Finn suggested that Pakistan gave a better account of themselves compared to previous games
Post-Match Reflections: Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan stated that the team lost early wickets and needs to improve their batting
Babar Azam congratulated his team for their performance in all three departments and credited Fakhar Zaman for his innings
Pakistan had more impetus at the top of the order with Fakhar Zaman
Steven Finn commented that there was less expectation on Bangladesh coming into this tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan's win keeps their semi-final hopes alive
Bangladesh becomes the first team to be officially eliminated
